title: Hour 3 – Covino and Rich Guest Host
itunes:title: Hour 3 – Covino and Rich Guest Host
description:
Covino and Rich fill in for Dan Patrick and the crew. LeBron James’ new contract brings up a question: would you give handouts to your friends if you were mega-mega rich? Covino shares an awesome update coming out of the world of the Little League World Series. Then, what is the statute of limitation on bragging about your team’s championship?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
